regions.title: School holiday regions
regions.intro: To spread out school holidays, the Netherlands is divided into 3 regions. These are the North, Middle, and South regions. This distribution helps reduce holiday crowding during school vacations.
regions.intro2: Below you will find an overview of the regions. For each region, you will see which provinces and municipalities belong to the region.
